name: Fjallraven Abisko Shorts - Men's
description: Durable shorts for tough backcountry conditions. Fjallraven's classic G-1000 fabric stands up to evereything you can throw at it, while stretching to move with you. The shaped fit and gusseted crotch is optimized for the long strides of hiking or the high steps of scrambling.Reinforced seat adds protection and peace of mind.Waist is cut higher in the back for extra coverage and comfort under a backpack.Gusseted crotch and thoughtfully placed inner thigh seams give you range of motion while preventing chafing.Lots of pockets: two front hand pockets, zippered thigh pockets and an inner mesh pocket.
